venue.name: Killington Peak Bucklin Trail Parking Lot

item.description:
This is the cross posted hiking event from my own hiking meetup group in VT.

Let's hike to one of five 4K footers in Vermont - Killington Peak!
This picture shows the view from Pico Peak (3957 ft) Ski Resort which I took last month during my hike to Killington Peak. This time, I'll take different trail which I haven't hiked yet to explore with you.

Hiking Plan:

1) We'll meet at parking lot of trailhead at 8:45AM and start hike on Bucklin Trail at 9AM for 3.3 miles to reach the junction of Long Trail.

2) Then, take right turn to Long Trail South about 0.2 miles and arrive at Cooper Lodge.

3) The rest of hike-in mileage is only 0.2 mi to reach to the summit of Killington Peak! Sounds easy!?

4) Eat lunch at the summit, then, we take same route for hike out.




Hiking Level:
Moderate
Hiking Distance: 7.4 miles for round trip
Hiking Pace: slow to moderate
Hiking Hours: 5-6 hours + Lunch 30min



Suggested Meetup Location:

Parking Lot at Bucklin Trail trailhead at Wheelerville Road, Rutland, VT at 8:45AM.
Approximate address: 3996 Wheelerville Road, Rutland, VT 05701

This is Bucklin Trail trailhead parking lot location on Google Map.


Depending on your interest, we can stop by "Inn at Long Trail (709 Route4, Killington, VT 1-802-775-7181)" on Rt 4 after hike which is well known by hikers where has a good pub. This is about 25min drive from the trailhead.


Weather check point is 7/17, 10PM.

If you have any questions, please feel free to drop me email.

Event Organizer,
Tomoko Nakajima



Updated on 07/14/2010:

I created Waypoints on Topo map for this hiking event. It includes hand-drawing trail routes and elevation gain/loss graph. If you don't have map on Long Trail, I highly recommend you print this out and bring it with you.

BucklinTrail_to_KillingtonPeak_07182010 Topo Map.
item.name: Killington Peak (4235 ft) hike in VT
